So basically, the ending is simply like body and soul aren't directed toward the same person from Emi: body to Shinji, soul to Ryuuma. Or, whatever the case with these two crazy nutjobs, this shows the dynamics of how a cuckold relationship looks like, whether you like it or not. We normies admonish it but hey there are crazy fucks out there that are into this "kink". Overall, I love the art, it's fucking good, Emi has that thiccness, I consider that my type, so delicious.

On a slightly happier note, we know that that is the dude's child, not prof's. But at the end, she does show interest in having prof's child. Either that or it might be her dirty talking to turned on the husband, who knows. A pretty bizarre relationship, but at least they're happy, in their own twisted way. 6/10 story,  9/10 fap material.

The prof. was scum through and through, rubbing it in Ryuuma's face like he won some competition, even after saying a lot of great things about the prof during ch 1 at dinner. Tbh this part wasn't necessary. I was with ending with the previous part where I assumed they'd just break up. But no, the author had to make the husband fuck. Not a good ending but hey, at least the child is ryuuma's

Part 2: It almost feels like the professor does not matter by the end of it, since it almost feels like he could have been anyone, and they would still love each other just as much in there in own perverse way. Ryuuma still loves her, not wanting to throw away their shared lives that had some semblance of care until the prof. showed up. I guess I am just a little confused as to what she wants or gets out of this situation. What did Ryuuma accept from her as a part of her life, her regret from not being with the prof. or simply just being excited from being someone else besides her husband. Either way, I am just glad this gave us some closure because the original ending of ch. 3 left me with a bitter taste, more so than other NTR stories. So, like others I'll take this ending over ch 3. I wonder if Itou Eight intended to end this with one more chapter after the third, or he just decided to write this fourth one after some time, because it does feel abrupt how everything proceeded.

We can see that Ryuuma considers himself as a terrible husband for feeling excited at seeing his wife go about her ways and this is what he asks of Emi to accept as a part of him. We see in ch. 3 that he decides to want to see them in the act with his own eyes instead of just hearing them, since he had the evidence to confront her from the recording. So his desire to know more about her lecherous side and how to instigate it was what got the best of him. My only question is, what was Emi's deal to begin with? Does she enjoy this only because it is done in front of Ryumma, just a mere physical attraction for the professor or her trying to not have regret from the past confession to him?  Because the ending shows, in their own twisted way, Emi and Ryuuma love each other, accepting each other's "kinks" to say the least and are together, even having a child together.
